message.content:
Based on the given lineage relationships, there is no direct or indirect connection between Jesse and Eugene. Jesse is only mentioned as an ancestor of Joshua, and Eugene is only mentioned as having Robert as an ancestor. There are no relationships that link Jesse to Eugene through any chain of ancestors or descendants. Therefore, none of the specified relationships (ancestor, descendant, common ancestor, common descendant) apply.

<ANSWER>5</ANSWER>
